body:
You need to ensure that all the values you want available to set Class to are already setup in the Classes list (Add/update at: Setup->Company->Classes)

There are some complications in automating the copying of these if the values of the custom field is not a direct type match to the Class field. These can be handled by someone familiar with SuiteScript.

Alternatively, if you have access to the program outside NS, you could simply update it to set the Class directly, when it interacts with the transaction line. (You'll still need to have added the appropriate values to the Classes list, as above.)
title: NetSuite: Duplicating value from custom transaction col field to class (line) field
